name: HEARTS YUM-YUM
description:
* HOW TO PLAY *

Please get the heart falling from the sky !

If you get the 30 score, you are going to be a winner :D

* DEFAULT KEY SETTINGS *

< Main Menu Scene >

Right, Left, Up, Down, Enter(Return) Buttons


<1P>

Right (b Button)

Left (c Button)

Jump (x Button)

Steal (z Button)


<2P>

Right (Right Button)

Left (Left Button)

Jump (L Button)

Steal (K Button)
